title: #counter-modulation
description: a term forged from [Deleuze](/tags/deleuze)'s concept of modulation (cf his *Postscript on the Societies of Control* ([en](https://cidadeinseguranca.files.wordpress.com/2012/02/deleuze_control.pdf), [fr](https://infokiosques.net/imprimersans2.php3?id_article=214))): if the marketing is all modulation and control, what are our defence weapons? Is there a way for citizens to modulate, control businesses? The short answer is yes, buy from busiensses you want to see grow, boycott irresponsible jerks. [The long answer](/articles/p2p-rm)
